name: Muse Mania
description:
A music game based around 8-bit soundtracks that can be played with varying difficulties. Based on the tile hitting mania games such as guitar hero, voez,  stepmania, etc.  Using 8-bit as a base for the art style to go along with the music which is also unique to the genre. 

Completely free

Release: 03/07/2021

Contacts:  Xandrix.Gayagoy@mds.ac.nz
